Meanwhile, in the sea off the coast of
Dong Hoi city, Quang Binh province, yesterday morning,
father and son swam to shore
after struggling with fierce waves,
especially fisherman Pham Giao
Phong living in Ha Thuong village.  Bao Ninh commune and his
son used a boat to leave Nhat
Le estuary to cast a fishing net in the sea
near the shore. While casting the net, they unfortunately
encountered big waves, causing the boat to capsize. Father and
son struggled with the fierce waves.  Swimmed
about 2 km to get to shore and asked for
help. I received news that local authorities
coordinated with
Quang Binh border guards to mobilize people to
rescue until 13:00 on the same day the boat
was salvaged and La Dac.  ashore earlier
to respond to the tropical depression
strengthening the fifth citadel in Quang Binh province, an
order was issued to erect the sea from 0:00 a.m. on
October 18 until the sea is safe according to the
announcement of the data shortage agency.
Local authorities need to actively
propagate fishermen to strictly comply with
regulations on posting signs to avoid unfortunate incidents
similar to the above from
happening. Moving on to other information,
today, October 20, is an important holiday
to give  flowers for women at this time, the
fresh flower market has become more vibrant at the
stores at Ho Thi Ky flower market, District 10,
Ho Chi
Minh City. According to information from traders, the price of
fresh flowers does not vary too much compared to
last year.  But it's still 20 to 30 more
than usual. The main reason is
because the demand for purchases has increased significantly. The
supplier is affected by erratic weather and
rain compared to usual, so
it's just a little more expensive.  It's also a
little taller than a li, but it's still
normal traditional flowers,
not new flowers. I
usually buy flowers as gifts for my mother, grandmother, and
female relatives and
on special occasions.  This October 20,
I wish everyone to be beautiful, always
young and healthy, always love life and
always get what they want. The
gift market is
changing more and more, but fresh gifts are still a gift.
Meaningful gifts are chosen by many people because of
their sophistication and meaning to
both the giver and the
recipient. October 19,
Dong Nai Department of Natural Resources and Environment announced that it has completed a
general inspection of more than 7,800 livestock facilities
across the country.  The results show that livestock
farming has many shortcomings and limitations,
typically not having a license registered and
not complying with regulations on environmental protection. The
authorities have decided to
sanction more than 160 establishments with a number of  fine of over 6
billion VND and at the same time intending to temporarily
suspend the operation of more than 950 establishments with violations, the
most common being livestock establishments
managed by the commune and district level. At the district level,
more than 1,000 places were inspected and over 760
places were discovered.  Animal husbandry has not been licensed for
environmental protection at the commune level, most of them are
small-scale farmers, environmental issues are not a
concern. However, there are nearly 300
large-scale farms that farm for businesses
but have not yet completed the procedures.  regarding the environment,
the waste is poorly treated and then seeps
into the soil and flows into the stream. In addition, dozens of
facilities and provincial management agencies violate
land use planning and operate without a
construction license.
Ho Chi Minh City Construction has
just planned to inspect a number of
real estate trading floors in the area. Accordingly,
the department will check the legal establishment and
implementation of the reporting regime of the
trading floors established during this period.  From
201, Ho Chi Minh City will check the
conditions for establishing the
reporting regime from January 2022 to
September 2023 of 81
real estate trading floors in the city.  The
inspection work will be conducted from October 16
to November 15, 2023. The Department of
Construction said the purpose of
this inspection plan is to strengthen inspection,
detect and strictly handle violations of
propaganda and guidance for floors.  Transactions must
strictly comply with legal regulations, evaluate the
difficult operating situation to
coordinate handling and resolution according to legal regulations
or recommend to competent authorities
to handle
artichokes, which are a precious herb widely admired in
Da Nang.  Latchi is a key specific material crop
of Lam Dong province. It is
predicted that in the coming time, with the
development of the market for many
diverse processed products, the
demand for artichoke raw materials will increase
sharply.  Lam Dong currently has about 162 hectares of
artichoke cultivation with an output of about 8,200
tons of artichokes that can be used for both stems, leaves, flowers
and roots, of which about 10 minutes of young stems and
flowers are used for fresh eating, 25 minutes of stems, leaves, flowers and roots are
dried for drinking 65 minutes.  ph is
processed into tea with export value with a number of
strategic products such as dried artichoke extract,
artichoke tablets, artichoke tea bags,
functional foods, artichoke current price is about 5.7
million VND m Ton Profit of more than 217 million
VND for  1 hectare per m year is many
times higher than that of other aquatic animals. Most of the
area where artichokes are grown is due to many pest concerns,
leading to insufficient raw material supply
for processing degraded varieties with
reduced quality and productivity.  meeting the
increasing demand of Lam Dong province. There needs to
be a solution for planning appropriate cultivation and processing of
artichokes,

last evening, October 19, at the trial of 22 defendants

phase 2 representative of the Procuracy
presented the impeachment and proposed sentences
for the defendants. The Party intended that the
Procuracy also proposed not to ask the
contractors to compensate for the 460 billion VND loss
of the case.  The case in which the defendants themselves are
responsible for Lien De representing the Procuracy proposed to
sentence the former General Director of the
Vietnam Expressway Development Investment Corporation,
Vec Tran Van Ta, to 3 to 4 years in prison for violating the
law.  Violating regulations on investment in
construction projects causing serious consequences,
defendant Tam was also sentenced to 2 years and 6 months
to 3 years in prison for irresponsibility
causing serious consequences, with a
proposed sentence of 5 years.  6 months to 7 years in prison
Cu, chairman of the council of VC members, Mai
Tuan Anh, was recommended to be sentenced to 36 months in prison
but was given a suspended sentence for the crime of
responsibility for causing serious consequences. The
remaining defendants were recommended to be sentenced to between
Two years in prison for other civil economic relations.
Defendants who are obliged to pay
compensation have the right to request legal individuals and entities
involved in causing
damage to reimburse the amount of compensation if
there is a dispute over the damages.  The party has the right to request
another civil case to be resolved.

When going down to the waste storage facility to process the waste,
four workers suddenly encountered an accident,
one person was injured.  died on the spot and three people were
seriously injured. The incident occurred in
Chau Thanh district, Tien Giang province on the afternoon of
October 19,
according to people at the scene at
about 3:00 p.m. on October 19 when four
workers arrived at the processing facility of the company.
TD gold shop on Provincial Road 864 in
Binh Duc commune, to treat underground waste, was
unfortunately gassed. After being
brought up by other workers, one person
died and the remaining three were
taken to the emergency room.  Among them, two people were in
critical condition and received news that the police department,
fire prevention and rescue department, had sent
many officers and soldiers to the scene to
rescue the victims and bring them out of the basement of
Tien Giang General Hospital.
injured to the scene to take the victim to the emergency room.
Currently, the incident is being
investigated to clarify the
reason for recruiting people to board the ship to
illegally exploit seafood abroad. Tran Van
Luyen and Pham Chi Dung were
arrested by Kien Giang police.  Temporarily detained both
accused of organizing illegal exit for others.
According to investigation results in early
September 2022, ship owner Van Luyen
asked captain Chi Dung to recruit fishermen to
board two fishing boats to cross
Malaysian waters.  Illegally exploiting seafood and bringing it
back to Vietnam to sell for profit. Dung recruited
27 fishermen to comply with the above requirements and erased the
last number of the boat to avoid detection
when he finished fishing. Dung controlled the boat to
return to Vietnam when the force  The
Coast Guard discovered and arrested and fined nearly 28
million VND, then continued to direct
Dung Dieu when the two ships and the
above fishermen passed through the overlapping waters
between Malaysia and Indonesia to exploit
natural resources.

Vietnam. A case of transporting nearly 6 kg of drugs was

Dong Nai police discovered that Phuong was in
contact with a number of illegal traffickers.
drugs in the Central provinces,

The decrease in sunlight hours
changes these factors, causing insects

seeing insects that are still active
in November when they normally
only breed from May to September.
Summers in Europe are now changing

may not reproduce again
because they do not have the necessary natural conditions.

Back to domestic cultural news
this year, the gift market on
October 20 has an interesting trend of
making wool flower bouquets, prices range from 20
to 75,000 VND per bunch. Designing a wool flower bouquet is
also very popular.  interestingly, the
wool is cut into a thread about 20 to 30
cm long. The artist uses a crochet hook to crochet the wool
in a flower bow pattern to create a beautiful flower.
To add freshness to the
wool bouquet, real or fake flowers can be cut.
Then they tie the bouquet tightly near
the top using rope or tape
to arrange the wool and flowers as desired to
create a beautiful bouquet. The work is very
meticulous and detailed from choosing the wool to the color design.  The
design of the bouquet is unique and eye-catching,
even the wrapping paper is fine. Be sure to carefully filter
the items that are handmade
so that you see them as gifts, it will
preserve that memory. Wool bouquets are
more durable than  with traditional flowers There
is also the value of giving high spiritual gifts that
